item.title: [dementhium] spec restore altar?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

The Unholy:

No, it is sending “You restore your prayer points.”

And I’m assuming that you compiled.

Perhaps it’s in one of the other ObjectEvent handlers. Like the SecondClick.

item.title: [dementhium] spec restore altar?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“The Unholy, post:1, topic:423617”]This is my code in objectpackethandler

case 13198: player.animate(645); player.setSpecialAmount(100); player.sendMessage("You pray to the gods, and restore your special energy!"); break;

But if I try to pray at the altar with full prayer points it will say my points are already full (like it does for a normal altar ID: 36972) and if I’m missing points it will let me restore my pray, but not my special attack? Even though in the method it doesn’t mention anything about restoring pray. Why is this?[/quote]

It’s possible that you have the wrong object id.

Read full topic

item.title: [dementhium] spec restore altar?
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

This is my code in objectpackethandler

case 13198: player.animate(645); player.setSpecialAmount(100); player.sendMessage("You pray to the gods, and restore your special energy!"); break;

But if I try to pray at the altar with full prayer points it will say my points are already full (like it does for a normal altar ID: 36972) and if I’m missing points it will let me restore my pray, but not my special attack? Even though in the method it doesn’t mention anything about restoring pray. Why is this?

Read full topic
